concept.title: Updated Visits Metric for Typed/Bookmarked in Referring Domains Report
concept.shortdesc: If you had Visits enabled for conversion metrics in SiteCatalyst 14, you will notice a change to the Visit count on this report after upgrading to SiteCatalyst 15.

conbody.p: In SiteCatalyst 14, a Typed/Bookmarked visit was counted anytime there was a server call with no referrer specified, regardless of where the server call occurred during the visit. In SiteCatalyst 14, a Typed/Bookmarked instance was counted only when the visit starts with a server call with no referrer specified.
Since the referrer can often be empty mid-visit due to actions such as Flash navigation and redirects, the instances and visits metric typically did not match in SiteCatalyst 14.
SiteCatalyst 15 was improved to count Typed/Bookmarked only when a visit starts with a server call with no referrer specified.
With this change, in SiteCatalyst 15 Instances of Typed/Bookmarked should match Visits, whereas, in SiteCatalyst 14, Instances were typically lower than Visits.
